PICRUST2 Workflow Installing PICRUST This was already done and does not need to be done again. mamba create -n picrust2 -c bioconda -c conda-forge picrust2=2.5.2 Required input file The input files should be a FASTA of amplicon sequences variants (ASVs; i.e.Â your representative sequences, not your raw reads) and a tab-delimited table with ASV ids as the first column and sample abundances as all subsequent columns. Example of both files : Running the full pipeline Running picrust throught command line (not R) Activate the environnement mamba activate picrust2
